text.section:
An airport zoning regulation adopted under this subtitle may not:
Require the removal or alteration of any structure that, as it existed when the regulation was adopted, did not conform to the regulation; or
Otherwise interfere with the continuance of any nonconforming use.

Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, an airport zoning district or airport zoning regulation adopted under this subtitle may not apply to any property located more than 3 miles beyond the outer perimeter of any airport.
